title: Secret Deceptions: Amatore's Restaurant - Part One
description: The first seven chapters from Amatore's Restaurant. This book takes the reader on an atmospheric journey from Berlin to Venice, Marseilles and Amsterdam cleverly interweaving themes of seduction and deception. What are the characters' true motives? Are their feelings genuine or are they just playing games? It soon becomes clear that nothing is as it seems.WARNING: Adult content; there are passages which describe sex explicitly.
author: James Sillwood
